abstract: While Petrobras is heavily into the deep-water business, its technical prowess at ferreting out hydrocarbons trapped in the ocean is world class.
snippet: While Petrobras is heavily into the deep-water business, its technical prowess at ferreting out hydrocarbons trapped in the ocean is world class.
lead_paragraph: Petrobras, the Brazilian energy giant, has taken a beating of late. But don’t blame BP for it all.

headline.main: Investors Are Wary of Petrobras Sale

byline.original: By Rob Cox and Christopher Swann
